concept.definition: Payment in full for products and/or services is required as soon as the service is performed or goods delivered.
Payment in full for products and/or services is required 30 days from the time the service is performed or goods delivered.
Payment in full for products and/or services is required 60 days from the time the service is performed or goods delivered.
Payment in full for products and/or services is required 90 days from the time the service is performed or goods delivered.

description: Describes payment terms for a financial transaction, used in an invoice. This is typically expressed as a responsibility of the acceptor or payor of an invoice.
name: v3 Code System PaymentTerms

text.div:
Release Date: 2016-03-23

LevelCodeDisplayDefinition
1COD Cash on Delivery Payment in full for products and/or services is required as soon as the service is performed or goods delivered.
1N30 Net 30 days Payment in full for products and/or services is required 30 days from the time the service is performed or goods delivered.
1N60 Net 60 days Payment in full for products and/or services is required 60 days from the time the service is performed or goods delivered.
1N90 Net 90 days Payment in full for products and/or services is required 90 days from the time the service is performed or goods delivered.
